# Build a bare-minimum PDF with extractable text
import struct

lines = [
    "Acme Corp Inc.",
    "Invoice Number: INV-2024-042",
    "Invoice Date: January 15, 2024",
    "",
    "Widget A  2  9.99  19.98",
    "Gadget B  1  49.99  49.99",
    "",
    "Subtotal: $69.97",
    "Tax: $6.30",
    "Total: $76.27",
]

# Build content stream
stream_lines = ["BT", "/F1 12 Tf", "72 750 Td"]
for i, line in enumerate\(lines\):
    if i > 0:
        stream_lines.append\("0 -18 Td"\)
    safe = line.replace\("\(", "\\\\\("\).replace\("\)", "\\\\\)"\)
    stream_lines.append\(f"\({safe}\) Tj"\)
stream_lines.append\("ET"\)
stream = "\\n".join\(stream_lines\)

objects = []
offsets = []
pdf = b""

def add\(content\):
    global pdf
    offsets.append\(len\(pdf\)\)
    encoded = content.encode\("latin-1"\) if isinstance\(content, str\) else content
    pdf += encoded

header = b"%PDF-1.4\\n"
pdf += header

# 1: catalog
add\(f"1 0 obj\\n<< /Type /Catalog /Pages 2 0 R >>\\nendobj\\n"\)
# 2: pages
add\(f"2 0 obj\\n<< /Type /Pages /Kids [3 0 R] /Count 1 >>\\nendobj\\n"\)
# 3: page
add\(f"3 0 obj\\n<< /Type /Page /Parent 2 0 R /MediaBox [0 0 612 792] /Contents 4 0 R /Resources << /Font << /F1 5 0 R >> >> >>\\nendobj\\n"\)
# 4: content stream
stream_bytes = stream.encode\("latin-1"\)
add\(f"4 0 obj\\n<< /Length {len\(stream_bytes\)} >>\\nstream\\n"\)
pdf += stream_bytes
pdf += b"\\nendstream\\nendobj\\n"
offsets.append\(None\)  # placeholder to keep offset count right
# 5: font
offset5 = len\(pdf\)
offsets_real = offsets[:4] + [offset5]
pdf += b"5 0 obj\\n<< /Type /Font /Subtype /Type1 /BaseFont /Courier >>\\nendobj\\n"

xref_offset = len\(pdf\)
pdf += b"xref\\n"
pdf += f"0 6\\n".encode\(\)
pdf += b"0000000000 65535 f \\n"
for i, off in enumerate\(offsets_real\):
    pdf += f"{off:010d} 00000 n \\n".encode\(\)
pdf += b"trailer\\n"
pdf += b"<< /Root 1 0 R /Size 6 >>\\n"
pdf += b"startxref\\n"
pdf += f"{xref_offset}\\n".encode\(\)
pdf += b"%%EOF\\n"

with open\("/tmp/test_invoice.pdf", "wb"\) as f:
    f.write\(pdf\)
